queryName: Service account lookup set to false
descriptionText: When using `kube-apiserver`, the `--service-account-lookup` flag should be set to `true`. This rule flags containers (including `initContainers`) that run `kube-apiserver` and explicitly set `--service-account-lookup=false`. Disabling this lookup skips verification that a token's service account still exists, which can allow tokens for deleted or revoked service accounts to be accepted; therefore the flag should be enabled (`true`).
